分電盤: (ぶんでんばん) - distribution board; panelboard; circuit breaker panel; fusebox
分霊: (ぶんれい) - division of a shrine's tutelary deity, in order to share it with another shrine; spirit divided in such a manner
分類体系: (ぶんるいたいけい) - classification system
分類基準: (ぶんるいきじゅん) - classificatory criterion
分類学: (ぶんるいがく) - taxonomy; science of classification
分類法: (ぶんるいほう) - classification system; classification method
分類番号: (ぶんるいばんごう) - class number
分類目録: (ぶんるいもくろく) - classified catalog; classified catalogue
分類表: (ぶんるいひょう) - classified table; classification table
分類記号: (ぶんるいきごう) - class symbol; class mark
分類辞: (ぶんるいじ) - classifier (in Japanese and Chinese linguistics)
分餐: (ぶんさん) - distribution (of bread and wine during Communion)
分骨: (ぶんこつ) - part of a person's ashes
切: (setsu/ki) - cortante, ansioso, sério, ardente, gentil, perspicaz, agudo
切った張った: (きったはった) - violent (fight); slashing and striking; hand-to-hand
切っての: (きっての) - the most . . . of all
切っても切れない: (きってもきれない) - inseparable (esp. bond, relationship); inextricable; joined at the hip; integral; essential; cannot be broken (cut, separated); indissoluble
切っ先: (きっさき) - point (of a sword, etc.); pointed verbal attack
切っ掛け: (キッカケ) - chance; start; cue; excuse; motive; impetus; occasion
切っ掛けに: (きっかけに) - with ... as a start; taking advantage of
切っ端: (きっぱし) - remains; fragment; remains after having cut something
切に勧める: (せつにすすめる) - to urge strongly
切らす: (きらす) - to be out of; to run out of; to be short of; to be out of stock
切らない: (きらない) - not through; not finished; not done
切ら無い: (きらない) - not through; not finished; not done
切り: (きり) - end/finish/stop; bounds/limits; (esp. 限り,限) delivery date (of a futures contract); finale (of a noh song)/end of an act (in joruri or kabuki)/final performance of the day (in vaudeville); counter for slices (esp. thick slices)/counter for cuts (e.g. fish, meat); (senses 6-8 are sometimes pronounced ぎり, esp. in old-fashioned speech)  only/just; (usu. in a negative sentence) since/after; remaining (in a particular state)
切りあげ: (きりあげ) - end/conclusion; rounding up; revaluation
切りかかる: (きりかかる) - to assault with a sword; to stab at; to slash at
切りがいい: (きりがいい) - good place (to leave off)
切りが良い: (きりがいい) - good place (to leave off)
切りそろえる: (きりそろえる) - to cut and even up; to cut several pieces to the same size
切りたんぽ: (きりたんぽ) - mashed rice pressed on a cryptomeria skewer and toasted (used as dumplings in soups)
切りっ端: (きりっぱし) - scraps; cut end; cut-off piece
切りつける: (きりつける) - to cut at; to slash at
切りなおす: (きりなおす) - to correct cutting; to reshuffle (playing cards)
切りぬく: (きりぬく) - to cut out; to clip from; to extract
切りのいい: (きりのいい) - good place (to leave off)
切りの良い: (きりのいい) - good place (to leave off)
切りはずす: (きりはずす) - to miss in attempting to kill
切りばり法: (きりばりほう) - gestalt method; a priori method
切りもち: (きりもち) - rice cakes cut into rectangles (esp. eaten on New Year's Day)
切りタイマー: (きりタイマー) - off timer (i.e. to automatically turn an electrical device off at a certain time)
切り上げ: (きりあげ) - end/conclusion; rounding up; revaluation
切り上げる: (きりあげる) - to close/to finish; to round up (a number); to revalue (a currency)
切り下げ: (きりさげ) - devaluation (e.g. of currency); markdown; write-down; undercutting
切り下げる: (きりさげる) - to cut down/to prune/to reduce/to cut and hang down/to cut shorter; to round down (e.g. fraction)
切り下ろす: (きりおろす) - to slash downward; to cut down
切り付ける: (きりつける) - to cut at; to slash at
切り伏せる: (きりふせる) - to slay; to cut down (a foe)
切り倒す: (きりたおす) - to cut down; to chop down; to fell
切り入る: (きりいる) - to cut into; to raid
切り入れる: (きりいれる) - to cut and insert
切り出し: (きりだし) - pointed knife; logging/cutting; (beef) scraps; starting to speak; extraction (of a portion of a media file)/splicing out
切り出す: (きりだす) - (切り出す, 切出す, 伐り出す only) to quarry/to cut (timber)/to cut and carry off; (切り出す, 切出す only) to begin to talk/to break the ice/to broach; (切り出す, 切出す, 鑽り出す only) to start a fire (with flint, by rubbing sticks together, etc.); (切り出す, 切出す, 伐り出す only) to select and extract (from a media file)/to splice out
切り分ける: (きりわける) - to cut up; to cut and discard; to eliminate systematically (in fault-finding); to isolate
切り刻む: (きりきざむ) - to hew; to chop up; to mangle; to mince
切り割る: (きりわる) - to cut in two
切り取り: (きりとり) - cutting/tearing off/cutting off/clipping; robbery with assault/burglary
切り取り強盗: (きりとりごうとう) - violent robbery or burglary; killing and robbing (someone)
切り取り線: (きりとりせん) - line to cut something off along
切り取る: (きりとる) - to cut off; to excise; to tear off; to cut out; to whittle down; to tear out; to cut down; to amputate
切り口: (きりくち) - cut end/section/opening/slit; point of view/(different) perspective/new approach
切り口上: (きりこうじょう) - stiff formality; set terms
切り合い: (きりあい) - crossing swords; fighting with swords; cutting each other (in fighting)
切り合う: (きりあう) - to fight with swords; to cross swords
切り回す: (きりまわす) - to manage/to control/to run/to handle; (also written as 斬り回す) to cut carelessly (of a cook, surgeon, etc.)/to slash about; to cut around
切り売り: (きりうり) - selling by the piece
切り変える: (きりかえる) - to change; to exchange; to convert; to renew; to throw a switch; to replace; to switch over
切り外す: (きりはずす) - to miss in attempting to kill
切り妻: (きりずま) - gable; gabled roof/building with a gabled roof/gabled roof construction
切り子ガラス: (きりこガラス) - cut glass; faceted glass
